crypto.desc: ```Fetches the price of given crypto currency from coinmarketcap using its API.```
crypto.eg:
crypto btc
crypto xrp
crypto eth

allowabuse.desc: ```The bot will reply even if it is abused.```

denyabuse.desc: ```The bot will not reply if the command conatains any cuss word. Also, it will abuse back.```

market.desc:
```Fetches the information of given symbol from NSE. Arguments it can take are,

üßø status - It will give the status of the market.
üßø search <name> - It will search all the companies with this name.
üßø details <key> - It will give all the details of the stock from NSE.
üßø losers - It will give top 10 loosers of NSE.
üßø gainers - It will give top 10 gainers of NSE.```
market.eg:
market status
market search tata
market details tcs
market losers
market gainers

sticker.desc: ```Converts the image, tagged image or video with length less than 11 seconds to sticker.```
sticker.eg:
sticker crop nodata
sticker crop pack cheems sticker author doge
sticker nodata

gaana.desc: ```Downloads songs of gaana.com from its url.```

pin.desc: ```Downloads the pinterest video from its url.```

tagall.desc: ```Tags all the members in the group.```
tagall.eg:
tagall class at 7am
tagall holiday today

adminlist.desc: ```Tags all the admins in the group.```

purge.desc: ```Removes all the members from the group.```

grouplink.desc: ```Creates a group invite link for the group.```

changedesc.eg:
changedesc New bot in the group.
changedesc cricket group.

join.desc: ```The bot will join the group with the invite link.```

keerthy.desc: ```The bot will send a keerthy suresh sticker.```

promote.desc: ```Promotes the tagged member as an admin.```

remove.desc: ```Removes the tagged member from the group.```

open.desc: ```Changes the setting so that only admins can message.```

close.desc: ```Changes the setting so that members can message.```

rashmika.desc: ```The bot will send a Rashmika sticker.```‚ô•Ô∏è

rs.desc: ```The bot will send a random sticker.```

meme.desc: ```The bot will send a meme from reddit.```

sourcecode.desc: ```Provids the link to the source code of the bot.```

changedp.desc: ```Sets the tagged media as profile picture of the group.```

changeprefix.eg:
changeprefix a
changeprefix i
changeprefix f

unban.desc: ```Allow a banned member to use th bot in the group again.```

shorturl.desc: ```Generates a short url uf the given link using lenk.cf API.```

add.desc: ```Adds the given number to the group.```

lyrics.desc: ```Provides the lyrics of the given song.```

ban.desc: ```Bans the tagged member from using the bot in this group.```

banlist.desc: ```Displays the list of members banned from using the bot in this  group.```
